Staff

Jump to: Instructors, Lead Teaching Assistants, UCS2s, UCS1s.

Note: Consult the calendar for the most up-to-date office hours. All GSI Office Hours will be held in Warren 101B.

Course Staff Email

Contact course staff via Ed with any questions or concerns. For sensitive matters, the staff email address data100.instructors@berkeley.edu is monitored by the instructors and a few lead TAs.
